author: niallp
msg: Bug 20784 Add 'error' style attributes to HTML tags - patch submitted by Jonathan R. DeRose.
Add errorStyle, errorStyleClass, errorStyleId and errorKey attributes to CheckboxTag, FileTag, MultiboxTag, PasswordTag, RadioTag, SelectTag, TextTag and TextareaTag.
Also some refactoring of few other classes to accomodate this change (CancelTag, ResetTag and SubmitTag).

author: stefano
msg: 1) changed "cocoon-2.1" to "cocoon" for the module name

author: dain
msg: Set the magic derby system property that causes derby to use explicity
file sync instead of relying on vm support for file open rws

author: mss
msg: bug 3806: Don't run this test on Solaris to avoid the hostname problem.  The regression tests should be the only part where SPF is run as root, so all other cases will fail but not hurt (I hope).
